questions.text: What is your main goal with intermittent fasting?
questions.subtitle: Choose the reason that motivates you the most!

questions.text: How experienced are you with intermittent fasting?
questions.subtitle: No worries if you're new! We'll guide you at every step.

questions.text: What do you find most challenging about fasting?
questions.subtitle: This helps us understand where you might need extra support.
Please enter your details so we can tailor you plan perfectly to achieve your goals.

questions.text: What should we focus on together? (Multi-select)
questions.subtitle: Exploring the key areas where our teamwork can make the biggest impact.

questions.text: Which intermittent fasting method do you prefer?
questions.subtitle: Various intermittent fasting methods can help us choose the one that best fits our lifestyle and goals.

questions.text: How many days a week do you plan to fast?
questions.subtitle: Consider how many days each week you intend to dedicate to fasting.

questions.text: How many meals do you eat per day?
questions.subtitle: Your daily meal frequency can help you make better dietary choices and maintain a balanced lifestyle.

questions.text: What time do you usually have your first meal?
questions.subtitle: Your first meal can provide insight into your eating habits and help you optimize your nutrition throughout the day.

questions.text: What time do you usually have your last meal?
questions.subtitle: Your last meal timing helps us optimize your fasting window.

questions.text: Do you track the nutritional value of your meals?
questions.subtitle: Your meals can reveal patterns in your eating habits and guide you in making healthier choices throughout the day.

questions.text: Do you know what calories are?
questions.subtitle: Calories measure energy in food. Understanding them helps manage fasting and nutrition goals effectively

questions.text: How many calories do you consume daily on average?
questions.subtitle: YEstimating your daily intake helps us provide better fasting and meal recommendations.

questions.text: How would you describe your eating habits? (Multi-select)
questions.subtitle: Estimating your daily intake helps us provide better fasting and meal recommendations.

questions.text: How much water do you drink daily?
questions.subtitle: Proper hydration supports fasting, energy levels, and overall well-being.

options.text: I mostly drink coffee and tea

questions.subtitle: Your activity level affects your fasting needs. Let’s align your plan accordingly.
Knowing your workout time helps us optimize fasting and energy management.

questions.text: How would you describe your lifestyle?
questions.subtitle: Your daily routine impacts your fasting success. Let’s personalize your experience.
We use this info to tailor your fasting plan and progress tracking.
